data.message: I just wanted to say that i'm a big fan of you and that i love you soo much, please never stop making music, you're a legend , you saved my live with your music i'm absolutely gonna buy your new album. you mean so much for me and for millions of others, i love you , i don't know how i could live without you and your music  your unfinished song 'Difficult' touched me really hard it's one of my favourites oh btw do you have a fanmail? i know it isn't guaranteed that you reach our letters but i just want to try, i hope that you reach this message, it will be an honor for me if you read this<3 i have so many things to say.congrats with you award i voted for you ;)loves, a real stan
